age.Description: Age of the participant at time of testing

high_density_grid.Description: Whether this patient had recordings with a high-density grid

Levels.yes: Patient had some of the measurements with HD grid
Levels.no: No HD recordings for this patient
Levels.n/a: Does not apply, this is not a patient

handedness.Description: Dominant hand of the participant according to the Edinburgh Handedness Questionnaire

Levels.originally R, but switched to L: Patient originally had right hand as dominant but later switched to left
Levels.n/a: Assessment of handedness is not available for this patient

language_dominance.Description: Language-dominant hemisphere of the participant as tested with one or combination of techniques in specified in language_dominance_technique

Levels.n/a: Assessment of language dominance is not available for this patient

language_dominance_technique.Description: Technique used to determine the language-dominant hemisphere of the participant

Levels.n/a: Assessment of language dominance is not available for this patient

iEEG.Description: Presence of intracranial electroencephalography (iEEG) recordings for the patient

Levels.yes: IEEG recordings for this patient are available
Levels.no: Patient did not participate in iEEG recordings

fMRI.Description: Presence of functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) recordings for the patient

Levels.yes: FMRI recordings for this patient are available
Levels.no: Patient did not participate in fMRI recordings

iEEG_hemisphere.Description: Hemisphere where iEEG electrodes were implanted

Levels.LR: Both left and right hemispheres were implanted
Levels.n/a: Patient was not implanted with iEEG electrodes
